Duel Antarpelatih PSM Makassar vs Kalteng Putera: Darije Kalezic Vs Gomes de Oliveira
06 Nov 2019, 11:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSM Makassar akan menghadapi Kalteng Putra pada laga pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 di Stadion Andi Mattalatta Mattoangin, Rabu (6/11/2019). Namun, kedua pelatih, Darije Kalezic dan Gomes de Oliveira, sama-sama berada dalam tekanan.
Darije dalam sorotan menyusul hasil minor PSM musim ini. Juku Eja tak pernah menang pada laga tandang. Stadion Andi Mattalatta Mattoangin juga tak lagi angker buat tim tamu. Di markasnya itu, PSM sudah menelan dua kekalahan.
Hasil minor itu membuat suporter terkesan 'melupakan' jasa Kalezic yang sukses membawa PSM meraih trofi juara Piala Indonesia 2018 dan menembus semifinal Piala AFC Zona ASEAN. Alhasil, belakangan ini tuntutan suporter agar Darije meletakkan jabatannya mulai bermunculan.
Pada berbagai kesempatan, Darije selalu bergeming. Dimatanya dari sisi teknis tak ada masalah dalam timnya. Meski diadang jadwal padat pada tiga ajang yang diikuti, penampilan PSM tetap sesuai yang ia harapkan.
"Tapi, ada faktor di luar itu yang tidak bisa saya tangani sebagai pelatih. Itu bukan wewenang saya," ujar Darije tanpa mau menjelaskan secara gamblang faktor nonteknis itu.
Belakangan, Darije pun mulai buka suara soal kepemimpinan wasit. Usai Juku Eja ditekuk tuan rumah Bhayangkara FC 2-3 (29/10/2019), Darije menuding kepemimpinan wasit yang membuat PSM tidak pernah menang di laga tandang harus berjuang keras untuk menang di kandang.
"Saya tegaskan PSM kerap dirugikan oleh keputusan wasit. Nilainya mencapai 70 persen. Sementara di Makassar kami tidak pernah minta bantuan wasit. Kalau ada yang bisa buktikan PSM dibantu wasit, 10 persen saja, saya akan berhenti melatih di Indonesia," tegas Darije Kalezic.

PSM Makassar vs Kalteng Putera Interfaith Duel: Darije Kalezic Vs Gomes de Oliveira
Nov 6 2019, 11:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSM Makassar will face Kalteng Putra in the 27th Shopee League 1 match at the Andi Mattalatta Mattoangin Stadium on Wednesday (11/06/2019). However, the two coaches, Darije Kalezic and Gomes de Oliveira, are both under pressure.
Darije was in the spotlight following the PSM minor results this season. Juku Eja has never won an away match. Andi Mattalatta Mattoangin Stadium is also no longer haunted for the visitors. At his headquarters, PSM had swallowed two defeats.
The minor result impressed fans 'forgetting' the services of Kalezic who successfully brought PSM to the 2018 Indonesian Cup championship trophy and broke through the AFC Cup semifinals in the ASEAN Zone. As a result, lately the demands of supporters that Darije put down his position began to appear.
On various occasions, Darije is always unmoved. In his eyes from the technical side there are no problems in his team. Despite the busy schedule in the three events that followed, PSM's performance remained as he had hoped.
"But, there are factors beyond that that I cannot handle as a coach. That is not my authority," Darije said without wanting to explain clearly the non-technical factors.
Later, Darije began to open his voice about the referee's leadership. After Juku Eja was bent by the host Bhayangkara FC 2-3 (10/29/2019), Darije accused the referee's leadership that made PSM never win in away games must fight hard to win at home.
"I emphasize that PSM is often disadvantaged by the referee's decision. The value reaches 70 percent. While in Makassar we never ask for referees' assistance. If anyone can prove PSM is assisted by the referee, only 10 percent, I will stop training in Indonesia," said Darije Kalezic.
